content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "google" command to search for information on the Brno Reservoir Trail. The search returned multiple websites with information on hiking and outdoor activities in the area, including alltrails.com, greatruns.com, and hikingisgood.com. Other websites provided general information on the Brno Reservoir and surrounding attractions.
"""

Latest Development:
"""

"""
